page.title: 04Education (Cornwall)
page.content: At this time there are no schools in our survey area.Most of the children of primary school age attend the {Delaware Junior and Infant School}at St. Ann's Chapel.They are picked up by school bus each morning and returned home each afternoon. Those of secondary age go by school coach to {Callington Comprehensive {School,}Callington. There are several children within the Chilsworthy/Latchley district who attend{private schools}in{Tavistock}or {Plymouth.}There used to be a primary school in Latchley but this closed many years ago.The former school building has been converted into a very luxurious house. There is a{playgroup}for those children younger than school-age and this is held in the Methodist Chapel in Chilsworthy.
